entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a character who is wading towards the crowd through a sea of books. He pulls Mr Weasley and Mr Malfoy apart.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is mentioned as being pulled apart by Hagrid. He has a cut lip.

entities.name: mr malfoy
entities.description: Mr Malfoy is mentioned as being hit in the eye by an Encyclopedia of Toadstools and having his eyes glittering with malice.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as being beckoned to by Mr Malfoy.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as having an old transfiguration book that Mr Malfoy tries to give back to her.

entities.name: encyclopedia of toadstools
entities.description: The Encyclopedia of Toadstools is mentioned as hitting Mr Malfoy in the eye.

entities.name: ginny's old transfiguration book
entities.description: Ginny's old transfiguration book is mentioned as being given back to her by Mr Malfoy.

relationships.description: Hagrid pulls Mr Weasley and Mr Malfoy apart.
Hagrid pulls Mr Weasley and Mr Malfoy apart.
Mr Weasley is not hit by the Encyclopedia of Toadstools, but it hits Mr Malfoy in the eye.
Mr Malfoy is holding Ginny's old transfiguration book.
The Encyclopedia of Toadstools hits Mr Malfoy in the eye.
Hagrid protects Mr Weasley from Mr Malfoy.
